name: @jyv/mongo
description: Out-of-the-box Generic Repository via MongoClient for NodeJS
author: Gus

scripts.build:deps: echo "‚öôÔ∏è  Building dependencies" cd ../core && yarn install && yarn build && cd ../mongo
scripts.clean: echo "üóë  Cleaning build..." && rimraf dist && yarn unlink:non-blocking
scripts.build:dist: yarn clean && yarn build && fpm transform . && cp README.md CHANGELOG.md dist/.
scripts.build:release: yarn build:dist && cd dist && npm publish --access=public
